Question1.Question: What animal did the Spartan King as a young boy kill to survive out in the wild? (300)

Question2.Question: The three casinos that Danny plans to rob are the Bellagio, the MGM Grand, and? (Ocean’s 11)

Question3.Question: How many dwarves accompany Bilbo and Gandalf on the adventure? (The Hobbit)

Question5.Question: Which German Actress Played Helen of Troy? (Troy)

Question6.Question: What is Scrappy Doo’s middle name? (Scooby-Doo)

Question7.Question: What does Brooks Hatlen carve into the wood before hanging himself? (Shawshank Redemption)

Question8.Question: What year was it released? (The Goonies)

Question9.Question: What piece of advice does the Joker write on the side of a truck? (The Dark Knight)
Question9.AnswerA: “An apple a day keeps the mice away.”
Question9.AnswerB: “Where there is a kill, there is a way.”
Question9.AnswerC: “The gun is mightier than the sword.”

Question10.Question: What present did Pooh get from Piglet? (Winnie the Pooh)
